meta_description: Discover RAM & The Cheech; 2 cultural landmarks in Riverside, CA. Explore exhibitions, programming & the rich heritage of Chicana/o/x art fostering community & a love for the arts.
hours_text:
# Riverside Art Museum and The Cheech Marin Center for Chicano Art & Culture

Current Admission Hours: Wednesday – Saturday, 10 am – 5 pm and Sunday, 12 pm – 5 pm

### [Riverside Art Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://riversideartmuseum.org/visit/about/)

Loading...

3425 Mission Inn Ave., Riverside, CA 92501

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://ramcheech.ticketapp.org/portal/product/14) [Schedule a Tour __](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://riversideartmuseum.org/arts-education/walk-wonder-museum-tours)

### [The Cheech](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://riversideartmuseum.org/visit/the-cheech-marin-center-for-chicano-art-culture/)

Loading...

3581 Mission Inn Ave, Riverside, CA 92501

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://ramcheech.ticketapp.org/portal/product/14) [Schedule a Tour __](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119215112/https://riversideartmuseum.org/arts-education/walk-wonder-museum-tours)

### Admission

  * Adult: $15.95
  * Senior (65+ years): $10.95
  * Educator/College Student: $10.95 (ID is required at check-in)
  * Children (13-17 years): $10.95
  * Children (12 years and under): Free
  * RAM (Riverside Art Museum & The Cheech Marin Center for Chicano Art & Culture) members: Free
  * Museum for All: Show your Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT), Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) or WIC card and photo ID in person at guest services to rece...

#### Program Details

* * *

# Riverside Art Museum & The Cheech

**Hours**

Wednesday-Saturday 10 a.m. - 5 p.m  
Sunday 12 p.m. - 5 p.m

### Admission

  * Adult: $15.95
  * Senior (65+)/Educator/College Student: $10.95 (ID required)
  * Children (13-17): $10.95
  * Children (12 and under): FREE
  * Military personnel (active): Free from Armed Forces Day through Labor Day through the Blue Star Museum Program.
  * Members: FREE
  * Museums for All: $1 per person (up to 4) with EBT/SNAP/WIC card and ID

Tickets include entry to both museums.  
Non-refundable.

### Member Tickets

[Login or create an account to reserve tickets.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251119024701/htt...
